colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES GZUNGS GZHUG DANG GNOD SBYIN 'KHOR LO SOGS RAB GNAS BYA TSUL PHUN TSOGS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I GSAL @010A *, ,BYED MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG PHA NONG KHA PA 'JAM DBYANGS PA SOGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA 'GA' ZHIG SNANG YANG GO SLA BAR DGONGS NAS PHYAG LEN DANG CHO GA'I YAN LAG 'GA' ZHIG GSAL BAR MA MDZAD 'DUG PAS, ,THAMS CAD TSANG ZHING GO SLA LA 'KHYER BDE BA CIG GYIS ZHES RGYAL KHAB CHEN PO PE'I CING GI KHRIMS LDAN 'DUS PA'I TSOGS LA LUGS GNYIS KYI BSLAB BYA LEGS PAR SLOB PA'I PHO BRANG SHAR GYI DZA SAG BLA MA PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO DANG, RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO SOGS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR SKYES PA'I GYI NA BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS, ,DAM PA GONG MA'I YIG CHA DANG PHYAG LEN MTHONG BRGYUD LTAR, 'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI GNAS MCHOG RI BO RTZE LNGAR BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL SMON LAM RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
